Class Application

java.lang.Object
Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application submitted by a student for an internship opportunity. Contains details such as application ID, applicant, opportunity, status, and dates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Application(String applicationID, Student applicant, InternshipOpportunity opportunity, ApplicationStatus status)
    Constructs an Application with the current date as applied date.
    Application(String applicationID, Student applicant, InternshipOpportunity opportunity, ApplicationStatus status, Date appliedDate)
    Constructs an Application with a specified applied date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationID, Student applicant, InternshipOpportunity opportunity, ApplicationStatus status)
      Constructs an Application with the current date as applied date.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique ID of the application
      applicant - the student applying
      opportunity - the internship opportunity
      status - the current status of the application

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationID, Student applicant, InternshipOpportunity opportunity, ApplicationStatus status, Date appliedDate)
      Constructs an Application with a specified applied date.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique ID of the application
      applicant - the student applying
      opportunity - the internship opportunity
      status - the current status of the application
      appliedDate - the date the application was submitted
